types.description: Choose 15 number to bet on lotofácil. Win by hitting 11, 12, 13, 14 ou 15 numbers. There are many chances to win!
Choose 6 numbers of 60 avaliables on mega-sena. Win by hitting 6, 5 or 4. Two sweeptakes are made by week to you bet and had a chance to become milionarie
Choose 5 numbers of 80 avaliable on quina. Win by hitting 5, 4, 3, or 2. Six sweeptakes are made by week and six chances to win.
Choose 2 numbers of 10 avaliable on lotomania. Win by hitting 5, 4, 3, or 2. Six sweeptakes are made by week and six chances to win.
